messages.title: Fighting against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for UK membership of the European Union. That's why we are fighting to stay in the Single Market and giving you a say on the final Brexit deal.

messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs. We urgently need additional investment in health and social care.

messages.title: Opposing school cuts
messages.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Southend West. Schools in Southend are set to lose £13.6m from their budgets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Party has always fought for UK's EU membership; promoting staying in the Single Market; advocating for public input in final Brexit deal.
Proposing increased funding for NHS; emphasizing need for more health and social care investment.
Challenging potential budget cuts to local schools by the Conservative Party; highlighting a significant loss of funding in local education.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for UK membership of the European Union. That's why we are fighting to stay in the Single Market and giving you a say on the final Brexit deal.
issues.education: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Southend West. Schools in Southend are set to lose £13.6m from their budgets.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs. We urgently need additional investment in health and social care.
